name: 1.Overview and Data Dictionaries
content:
Overview of BTS Risk Analysis

The BTS Risk Analysis app is a comprehensive tool designed to evaluate and analyze risk factors associated with deploying Base Transceiver Stations (BTS) across various locations in the USA. By leveraging analytical models and user-defined parameters, the app assists in determining the viability and suitability of potential deployment sites, aiding decision-making processes for telecom infrastructure expansion.


Data Description

City: City Name

Internal_Audit_Score: Score value in range 0-100 for Internal Audit

External_Audit_Score: Score value in range 0-100 for External Audit

Fin_Score: Score value for financial situation

Loss_Score: Score value for loss

Past_Result: Score for past performance

Location_Score: Location advantage score

BTS_Deploy_Under_Risk: whether the BTS is in risk or not (1,0)
